dcterms:description: The BRATS2020 dataset provides brain tumor images of four modalities: Flair, T1, T1ce, and T2, all manually segmented by experienced raters. Annotations include the GD-enhancing tumor (ET), peritumoral edema (ED), and the necrotic and non-enhancing tumor core (NCR/NET).
dcterms:title: BRATS2020

dcterms:creator: B. H. Menze

K. Farahani
J. Kirby
Y. Burren
N. Porz
J. Slotboom
R. Wiest
dcterms:description: The BRATS dataset is a multimodal brain tumor image segmentation benchmark that provides a comprehensive collection of MRI scans for evaluating segmentation algorithms.
dcterms:title: BRATS
